data.query: Publish this post: 'Excited to share our latest product launch!' with image_url: 'https://contoso.com/images/launch.jpg'
Post the following LinkedIn content: 'Join us for our annual BuildEvents conference in Chicago!' with image_url: 'https://contoso.com/images/conference.jpg'
Post this finalized draft to LinkedIn: 'We’ve reached 10,000 customers thanks to you!'
Publish the following post: 'The future of AI starts now.' with image_url: 'https://contoso.com/images/ai_future.png'
Publish this finalized LinkedIn text: 'Our team just wrapped up a major milestone in product development.'
Post: 'We’re hiring! Explore opportunities at Contoso.' with image_url: 'https://contoso.com/images/hiring_banner.png'
Publish this LinkedIn update: 'Contoso BuildEvents 2025 is officially live!' with image_url: 'https://contoso.com/images/buildevents_launch.jpg'
